function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using questionnaire survey and field research methods to gather first-hand information","Impact":"Incomplete or inaccurate data collection, leading to unreliable results","Mitigation":"Conducting a pilot study to test the feasibility of the questionnaire and ensuring informed consent from participants","Technologies":"Data validation tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, survey participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Recruiting respondents from the community without strict criteria for health status","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread if individuals with contagious diseases participate","Mitigation":"Screening participants for health status and implementing safety protocols during data collection","Technologies":"Health screening tools, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Community committee, researchers","Owner":"Community committee, researchers"}]}
